alert.note: Alert for Harper; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 4:42PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ellis, south central Harper and west central Woodward Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 442 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Shattuck, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fargo, May, Tangier, and Catesby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
